modShortDescription: The maximum character level is increased from 300 to 500. All attributes have been increased from 10 to 13 levels.
modDescription:
The maximum character level is increased from 300 to 500\. All attributes have been increased from 10 to 13 levels, and most [perks](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-perks/) have been given 1 to 3 new levels with fun and powerful new bonuses. Run faster, hit harder, be stealthier, and learn new recipes.

This mod works on servers with no client side installation necessary, or on single player games.

**[Download](https://imadeyoursite.com/7days/BModHighLevelPerks.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/24958-brians-mods-for-alpha-196/).

**Credits:** [Dhlmaster](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/dhlmaster/)
